languages.text: "Что тут понимать? Крударах всю жизнь опирался на предвидения провидцев. Внимал каждому их слову. И к чему это привело? Неужели ты считаешь, что это я виновата в бедах моего мира?"

traits.locale_text: "Что тут понимать? Крударах всю жизнь опирался на предвидения провидцев. Внимал каждому их слову. И к чему это привело? Неужели ты считаешь, что это я виновата в бедах моего мира?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "What is there to know? Crudarach always relied on the Farseers' predictions. Heeding their every word. And what good did it do in the end? Do you really think I am to blame for my world's misfortunes?"
languages.original_text: "Что тут понимать? Крударах всю жизнь опирался на предвидения провидцев. Внимал каждому их слову. И к чему это привело? Неужели ты считаешь, что это я виновата в бедах моего мира?"

traits.locale_text: "What is there to know? Crudarach had always relied on the Farseers' predictions. Heeding their every word. And what good did it do in the end? Do you really think I am to blame for my world's misfortunes?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What is there to know? Crudarach had always relied on the Farseers' predictions. Heeding their every word. And what good did it do in the end? Do you really think I am to blame for my world's misfortunes?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What is there to know? Crudarach always relied on the Farseers' predictions. Heeding their every word. And what good did it do in the end? Do you really think I am to blame for my world's misfortunes?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What is there to know? Crudarach always relied on the Farseers' predictions. Heeding their every word. And what good did it do in the end? Do you really think I am to blame for my world's misfortunes?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What is there to know? Crudarach always relied on the Farseers' predictions. Heeding their every word. And what good did it do in the end? Do you really think I am to blame for my world's misfortunes?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «¿Qué hay que saber? Crudarach siempre confió en las predicciones de los videntes. Acatábamos todos sus vaticinios. ¿Y de qué nos sirvió al final? ¿De verdad crees que yo tengo la culpa de las desgracias de mi mundo?».
languages.original_text: "What is there to know? Crudarach always relied on the Farseers' predictions. Heeding their every word. And what good did it do in the end? Do you really think I am to blame for my world's misfortunes?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué hay que saber? Crudarach siempre confió en las predicciones de los videntes. Acatábamos todos sus vaticinios. ¿Y de qué nos sirvió al final? ¿De verdad crees que yo tengo la culpa de las desgracias de mi mundo?».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「何を知る必要がある？クルダラはいつも先見司たちの予言を頼りにしていた。その言葉の全てに耳を傾けた。それが結局何の役に立った？我が惑星の不幸は我のせいだと本気で思っているのか？」
languages.original_text: "What is there to know? Crudarach always relied on the Farseers' predictions. Heeding their every word. And what good did it do in the end? Do you really think I am to blame for my world's misfortunes?"

traits.locale_text: 「何を知る必要がある？クルダラはいつも先見司たちの予言を頼りにしていた。その言葉の全てに耳を傾けた。それが結局何の役に立った？我が惑星の不幸は我のせいだと本気で思っているのか？」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我有什么好清楚的？克鲁达拉赫一直依赖先知的预言，倾听他们的每一句话，它最后又得到了什么好处？我的世界遭到了劫难，你真的认为这都是我的错吗？”
languages.original_text: "What is there to know? Crudarach always relied on the Farseers' predictions. Heeding their every word. And what good did it do in the end? Do you really think I am to blame for my world's misfortunes?"

traits.locale_text: “我有什么好清楚的？克鲁达拉赫一直依赖先知的预言，倾听他们的每一句话，它最后又得到了什么好处？我的世界遭到了劫难，你真的认为这都是我的错吗？”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Que sais-je, exactement ? Crudarach a toujours compté sur les prédictions des Grands Prophètes. Le peuple buvait leurs paroles. Et tout cela pour quoi ? Pensez-vous vraiment que je sois responsable des malheurs de mon monde ? »
languages.original_text: "What is there to know? Crudarach always relied on the Farseers' predictions. Heeding their every word. And what good did it do in the end? Do you really think I am to blame for my world's misfortunes?"

traits.locale_text: « Que sais-je, exactement ? Crudarach a toujours compté sur les prédictions des Grands Prophètes. Le peuple buvait leurs paroles. Et tout cela pour quoi ? Pensez-vous vraiment que je sois responsable des malheurs de mon monde ? »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Was gibt es da zu wissen? Crudarach war schon immer abhängig von den Prophezeiungen der Runenpropheten. Jedem ihrer Worte wird gefolgt. Und zu was hat das am Ende geführt? Und dann glaubt Ihr wirklich, dass ich Schuld trage an den Schicksalsschlägen meiner Welt?"
languages.original_text: "What is there to know? Crudarach always relied on the Farseers' predictions. Heeding their every word. And what good did it do in the end? Do you really think I am to blame for my world's misfortunes?"

traits.locale_text: "Was gibt es da zu wissen? Crudarach war schon immer abhängig von den Prophezeiungen der Runenpropheten. Jedem ihrer Worte wird gefolgt. Und zu was hat das am Ende geführt? Und dann glaubt Ihr wirklich, dass ich Schuld trage an den Schicksalsschlägen meiner Welt?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Daha bilecek ne kaldı ki? Crudarach halkı, her daim Ötesezenlerin kehanetlerine güvenirdi. Söyledikleri her bir sözü önemserdi. Bu onlara ne olarak döndü? Dünyamın yaşadığı talihsizliklerin suçlusu sence gerçekten ben miyim?"
languages.original_text: "What is there to know? Crudarach always relied on the Farseers' predictions. Heeding their every word. And what good did it do in the end? Do you really think I am to blame for my world's misfortunes?"

traits.locale_text: "Daha bilecek ne kaldı ki? Crudarach halkı, her daim Ötesezenlerin kehanetlerine güvenirdi. Söyledikleri her bir sözü önemserdi. Peki sonunda bu ne işlerine yaradı? Dünyamın yaşadığı talihsizliklerin suçlusu sence gerçekten ben miyim?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
